
:::{#lem-d_logodds-d_odds}
$$\derivf{\logodds}{\odds} = \odds^{-1}$$
:::

---

::: proof
$$
\ba
\derivf{\logodds}{\odds}
&= \deriv{\odds}\log{\odds}
\\
&= \odds^{-1}
\ea
$$
:::

---

:::{#cor-d_logodds-d_odds}

$$\derivf{\logodds}{\odds} = \frac{1-\pi}{\pi}$$
:::

---

::: proof
$$
\ba
\derivf{\logodds}{\odds}
&= \odds^{-1}
\\
&= \frac{1-\prob}{\prob}
\ea
$$
:::

---

:::{#thm-deriv-logit}

#### Derivative of logit function

$$\logit'(\prob) = \derivf{\logodds}{\prob} = \frac{1}{(\prob)(1-\prob)}$$
:::

---

::: proof

Using @cor-d_logodds-d_odds, @thm-deriv-odds, and the chain rule (@thm-chain-rule):

$$
\ba
\derivf{\logodds}{\prob}
&= \derivf{\logodds}{\odds} \derivf{\odds}{\prob}
\\
&= \frac{1-\prob}{\prob} \frac{1}{\sqf{1-\prob}}
\\
&= \frac{1}{(\prob)(1-\prob)}
\ea
$$

:::
